feed.title: CS@Ashoka
feed.subtitle: CS@Ashoka, maintained by the Department Representatives, is your go-to resource for all things Computer Science at Ashoka University. Explore course materials, project showcases, internship opportunities, and more, all curated to enhance your academic journey.

entry.title: Roshni Agarwal Wins ESET Women in Cybersecurity Scholarship

link.title: Roshni Agarwal Wins ESET Women in Cybersecurity Scholarship

entry.summary: Celebrating Roshni Agarwal's achievement in receiving the prestigious ESET Women in Cybersecurity Scholarship for her exceptional work and potential in cybersecurity.
